title: Exquisite Emerald Polki Jhumka Earrings - Telugu Vadhina's Delight
features: Geometric design with square and triangle shapes. Features intricate Pachi setting surrounding each Polki diamond. The green enamel detailing offers a refreshing contrast to the brilliance of the diamonds and the richness of the gold. The square studs are adorned with delicate white diamonds to add to the pieceâ€™s unique shape. Traditional Jhumka silhouette reimagined with a modern twist.

description: A striking blend of traditional South Indian design and modern aesthetics. The uncut Polki diamonds offer a unique sparkle and a timeless appeal. The meticulous craftsmanship reflects the rich heritage of Hyderabadi jewelry making. A statement piece that enhances any ensemble and becomes a treasured heirloom. This design is sure to make you stand out at your next function.
